overview: Metropolis Pt. 1: The Miracle and the Sleeper, Afterlife, Under a Glass Moon, Wait for Sleep, Surrounded, The Ytse Jam (with drum solo), Puppies on Acid, Take the Time, To Live Forever, Barfbag, Another Day, Only a Matter of Time (with "March of the Tyrant" outro), Pull Me Under, Eve, Learning to Live
title: Dream Theater: [1993] Game, Set, Metropolis!
